Template Development

The current templates being developed are listed below. All templates are Works in Progress (WIP) and are subject to change.

  • My Benefits & Coverage
    • Benefits Summary
      • link Individual MA -- with Medical Tiers, HMO
      • link Individual MA -- with Medical Tiers, HMO - Variation (add new rider)
      • link Group MA -- with tiers, PPO
      • link Group MAPD -- LIS, no medical tier
      • link Individual PDP -- non-LIS, with drug tiers
      • link Combo plans: Individual PDP plus SHIP
      • link Group SSUP
  • Payments
    • Submit Pages
      • link Automatic Pay Submitted (EFT)
      • link Onetime Pay Submitted (EFT)
    • Overview
      • link Monthly Billing - Variation W/ Confirmation
  • Contact Us
